description.value:
If used by a Necron, as a Full Action can be used against target within 2 metres who must make -20 Dodge/Strength Test. If failed they are trapped within the Extra-Dimensional Prison of the Labyrinth, and can only leave if the user allows it. Requires 10 rounds to recharge after use.

Requirements

Non-Necrons must make -30 Logic test (or -10 if having Tech-Use) to use, if test failed by 4+ DoF become target of the Tesseract Labyrinth. Always Best Quality. Xenotech.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
